feed.title: Category: Photography | Personal blog of Quentin Rousseau

entry.title: Paris Timelapse Experiment
entry.content:
My first timelapse try with a amazing view from paris.

Next time, i will try to shoot the same view with a sunrise & a sunset.

MATERIALS

plain Nikon D90 Nikon AF 50 MM F/1.8 D Poor unstable tripod

SOFTWARES

plain Nikon Camera Control Pro 2 Adobe Premiere Pro CS5.5 (1824 Photos, No effects)

MUSIC

Flume – Sleepless feat. Anthony For Cleopatra

CREDITS

Mathieu Lacrouts for music choice. mathieulacrouts.fr
